laboratory_examinations.findings: Monocytes from the patient displayed higher expression of all tested ISGs compared to healthy controls.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Expression of all five ISGs remarkably declined after initiation of baricitinib treatment.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Total STAT1 and Phosphorylated STAT1 Measurement
laboratory_examinations.findings: T lymphocytes from the patient before treatment expressed higher levels of total STAT1 than that observed in healthy controls. Baseline levels of pSTAT1 were comparable to healthy controls, but higher levels of pSTAT1 were observed upon IFN-Î± stimulation before treatment.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The enhanced pSTAT1 observed in patient T lymphocytes before baricitinib treatment was strongly reduced during treatment.
